channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Epstein appeared to offer political advice on dealing with Trump in 2018: Emails
item.description: Jeffrey Epstein was still actively shopping his political and financial acumen with major power players on the international stage in 2018.

item.title: Remembering CBS News producer and video editor Seth Fox
item.description: The CBS News family is mourning the loss of producer and video editor Seth Fox. He leaves behind a wife and three children. He was 49.

item.title: Greene says Trump's stance on Epstein files is "huge miscalculation"
item.description: Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene told "CBS Mornings" that President Trump's opposition to releasing files from the federal investigation into co...

item.title: Emails reveal Epstein’s network of the rich and powerful despite sex offender status
She wanted to keep her son in his school district. It was more challenging than it seemed
item.description: When families are evicted, kids’ schooling is often disrupted. Many evicted families go from living in a school district that spends more money on stu...

item.title: Extended interview: Annie Lennox
item.description: Anthony Mason talks with Annie Lennox about her long-awaited visual memoir, "Annie Lennox: Retrospective," which is out now. She recounts the most thr...

item.title: New prosecutor chosen in Georgia 2020 election interference case
item.description: A new prosecutor has been chosen to take over the Fulton County election interference case against President Trump and others after DA Fani Willis' di...

item.title: New prosecutor to take on Georgia election case against Trump and others
Mega Millions jackpot nears $1 billion ahead of Friday night's drawing
item.description: The Mega Millions jackpot is now the eighth largest in history ahead of Friday night’s drawing where one lucky person could win an estimated $965 mill...

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Green addresses Epstein files: "The government will not protect the predators"
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene speaks to "CBS Mornings" about the push to release the Epstein files. She was one of four Republicans that joined Democrat...

item.title: Some Cheetos and Doritos won't have their bright color anymore
item.description: New versions of Cheetos and Doritos, without artificial flavors or dyes, will be sold in December.

item.title: WATCH: Leonardo DiCaprio eulogizes primatologist Jane Goodall
item.description: DiCaprio paid tribute to Goodall in a moving eulogy at the late environmentalist's funeral service on Wednesday.

item.title: WATCH: Former ABC News senior correspondent Jim Avila dies
item.description: Jim Avila, former ABC News senior correspondent and “20/20” correspondent, passed away after a long illness.
